articles.title: Luat Doanh nghiep 2020 - Nhung diem moi quan trong
articles.content: Luat Doanh nghiep so 59/2020/QH14 co hieu luc tu ngay 01/01/2021, thay the Luat Doanh nghiep 2014.

articles.title: Quy dinh moi ve thue TNCN nam 2025
articles.content: Muc giam tru gia canh cho nguoi nop thue la 11 trieu dong/thang va 4,4 trieu dong/thang cho moi nguoi phu thuoc.

articles.title: Huong dan dang ky BHXH cho doanh nghiep moi
articles.content: Doanh nghiep moi thanh lap phai dang ky tham gia BHXH trong vong 30 ngay ke tu ngay ky hop dong lao dong dau tien.
